text:
Crush counter punishes:

st. HP (CC), (microwalk) st. HP xx v-skill xx P, upball (300, 500) - Note that super cancel is impossible here since you connect late, so you to juggle straight into super from v-skill. This is technically damage optimal but it won't always be possible if you're not close, so I'll list some other stuff.
st. HP (CC) xx f+KKK, st. MK xx HK xx HP (247, 396)
st. HP (CC) xx f+KKK, cr. MK, cr. LP xx LK upball (249, 431) - The damage and stun are higher on this one.

Note that if you're absolutely point blank, you have to omit the cr. LP and go straight for cr. MK xx upball on the previous combo
st.HP (CC) xx f+KKK, st.HK, VT1, st.HP xx v-skill xx p, ball (p), CA or upball (coming/coming)
